description: This file defines the DashboardPage widget for a Flutter application, presenting a role-aware dashboard with quick action tiles and summary info cards, facilitating navigation based on user roles such as Professional, Gym, or regular user.

classes.name: DashboardPage
classes.description: Main widget for displaying a role-based dashboard with various actionable tiles and summary info.

classes.name: _InfoCard
classes.description: Widget for displaying a summary information card within the dashboard.

classes.name: _ActionTile
classes.description: Data class representing an actionable tile with title, icon, and navigation path.

classes.name: _ActionCard
classes.description: Widget representing an individual action card that navigates to different app routes when tapped.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the DashboardPage, including header, info cards, and action tiles.

methods.name: _roleLabel
methods.description: Determines the label for the user's role based on the 'me' object, handling nulls and exceptions gracefully.
